# How To Build an Email List for Affili

what_you_do: The website offers an email database and filtering tools to help users find and connect with business coaches.
who_you_serve: The website's target audience appears to be businesses and individuals looking to connect with business coaches.
offering: The website provides access to an email database of business coaches and tools to filter and connect with them.
social_proof: The website features logos of several well-known companies, suggesting it has worked with reputable clients.
business_focus: Providing access to a database of business coaches and tools to connect with them.
service_provided: Email database, creator discovery, data enrichment, creator outreach
